column2: [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"|a letter]] to George Burke Johnston'''.<ref name=CG/>

column1: *'''Contents:''' Burke Johnston had sent a "specially printed
column2: specially bound copy of" his booklet ''[[The Poetry of J.R.R. Tolkien]]'' to Tolkien
column3: who responded with a thank you note and explained that in his youth "root" was used as "boot" is now
column4: i.e. slang for "kick".<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=13820|articlename=Poetry of J.R.R. Tolkien. 1967|dated=|website=TB|accessed=7 January 2017}}</ref> Tolkien also wrote that he will be moving from [[Oxford]] soon.<ref name=CG>{{CG|C}}
